channel.title: Image processing on Tiffany Chieu
channel.description: Recent content in Image processing on Tiffany Chieu

item.title: Optimizing image processing in Rust with SIMD intrinsics
item.description: Single instruction, multiple data (SIMD) intrinsics allow us to vectorize operations that would otherwise occur sequentially. This can greatly speed up a series of simple, repetitive operations that might be normally executed using loops. One place such operations are commonly found is in image processing.
